articles.author: Rob Dawson
articles.content:
Pep Guardiola has said that Manchester City do not need to spend £100 million on one player to compete with the best teams in Europe.
City have spent heavily since their takeover by Abu Dhabi in 200… [+2906 chars]
articles.description: Pep Guardiola has said that Manchester City do not need to spend £100 million on one player to compete with the best teams in Europe.
articles.title: Guardiola: Man City don't need to spend £100m on one player to compete with best clubs - ESPN
